of the nft","seller":"the address of the seller of nft "}},"logListingPriceChanged(uint256)":{"params":{"newListingPrice":"the new price of listing an nft"}},"logPending(uint256,uint256,uint8,address,address,address,bool,uint256)":{"details":"notify the user that the item is pending and need to be validated first to be listed","params":{"buyer":"the address of the buyer of the nft","isSold":"boolean to check whether the nft has been sold or not","itemID":"the id of the nft in the marketplace","itemState":"the state of the nft 'pending - listed for sale - sold - removed'","nft":"the address of the nft ","price":"the price of the nft","seller":"the address of the owner or seller of the nft","tokenID":"the actual Id of the nft"}},"logPriceChanged(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"itemId":"the ID of the item which the caller want to change its price","newPrice":"the new price of the marketplace"}},"logSold(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"details":"notify the user that the item is sold by whom with how much","params":{"buyer":"the address of the buyer of the nft","itemId":"the id of the nft that has been sold","price":"the price of the nft","seller":"the address of the seller of nft "}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"BuyItem(uint256)":{"details":"it check for enough funds and transfer the nft to buyer and money to seller","params":{"_itemId":"the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace"}},"acceptItem(uint256)":{"details":"it changes the state of the item from pending to listedForSale and notify the validator","params":{"_itemId":"the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace"}},"changeItemPrice(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"change the price of an nft in case the caller is the owner of the nft and that nft isn't sold","params":{"_itemId":"the ID of the item which the caller want to change its price","_newPrice":"the new price of the nft"}},"changeListingPrice(uint256)":{"details":"you have to pause the contract first to call this function to notify the customers of the new listing price","params":{"newListingPrice":"the new price of listing nft in the marketplace"}},"createListingRequest(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_price":"the price of the nft the sender want to list for sale","_tokenID":"the ID of the nft the sender want to list for sale","nftContract":"the address of the nft the sender want to list for sale "},"returns":{"_0":"the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace"}},"getAllListedItems()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all market items that listed for sale"}},"getAllPedningItems()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all the pending market items"}},"getAllRemovedItems()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all the pending market items"}},"getAllSoldItems()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all sold market items"}},"getItemsCreated()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all the created items by msg.sender "}},"getListingPrice()":{"returns":{"_0":"the price of listing an nft for sale"}},"getMarketplaceOwner()":{"returns":{"_0":"the address of the marketplace owner"}},"getMyNFTS()":{"returns":{"_0":"array contains all the market items which has been bought by caller"}},"getNumberOfAllNFTS()":{"returns":{"_0":"allnftsCounter  "}},"getNumberOfPendingNFTS()":{"returns":{"_0":"PendingItemsCounter "}},"getNumberOfSoldNFTS()":{"returns":{"_0":"SoldNFTCounter "}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"grantValidator(address)":{"details":"this function is called by the admin only although it prevents the admin from granting the role himself as he is already a validator","params":{"newValidator":"the address of the person the admin want to make him a validator"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"rejectItem(uint256)":{"details":"it changes the state of the item from pending to remove and send the nft back to it's owner notify the validator","params":{"_itemId":"the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"revokeValidator(address)":{"details":"this function is called by the admin only also it prevents the admin from revoking the role himself","params":{"ToBeRevokedValidator":"the address of the person the admin want to remove him from validation"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"withdrawItem(uint256)":{"details":"it checks if the caller is the owner of item or not","params":{"_itemId":"the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace"}}},"title":"Fixed Price NFT Marketplace","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"logListedForSale(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"the item is listed for marketplace"},"logSold(uint256,uint256,address,address)":{"notice":"the nft is sold "}},"kind":"user","methods":{"BuyItem(uint256)":{"notice":"buying a token which listed for sale at fixed logListedForSale(uint256,uint256,address.details: notify the user that the item is listed for sale

params.itemId: the id of the nft in the marketplace
params.seller: the address of the seller of nft

params.newListingPrice: the new price of listing an nft

logPending(uint256,uint256,uint8,address.details: notify the user that the item is pending and need to be validated first to be listed

params.buyer: the address of the buyer of the nft
params.isSold: boolean to check whether the nft has been sold or not
params.itemID: the id of the nft in the marketplace
params.itemState: the state of the nft 'pending - listed for sale - sold - removed'
params.seller: the address of the owner or seller of the nft
params.tokenID: the actual Id of the nft

params.itemId: the ID of the item which the caller want to change its price
params.newPrice: the new price of the nft

logRemoved(uint256).details: notify the validator that the item has been removed from the marketplace

params.itemId: the id of the nft which has been removed from the marketplace

logSold(uint256,uint256,address,address).details: notify the user that the item is sold by whom with how much

params.buyer: the address of the buyer of the nft
params.itemId: the id of the nft that has been sold
params.seller: the address of the seller of nft

BuyItem(uint256).details: it check for enough funds and transfer the nft to buyer and money to seller

params._itemId: the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace

acceptItem(uint256).details: it changes the state of the item from pending to listedForSale and notify the validator

params._itemId: the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace

changeItemPrice(uint256,uint256).details: change the price of an nft in case the caller is the owner of the nft and that nft isn't sold

params._itemId: the ID of the item which the caller want to change its price
params._newPrice: the new price of the nft

changeListingPrice(uint256).details: you have to pause the contract first to call this function to notify the customers of the new listing price

params.newListingPrice: the new price of listing nft in the marketplace

params._price: the price of the nft the sender want to list for sale
params._tokenID: the ID of the nft the sender want to list for sale
params.nftContract: the address of the nft the sender want to list for sale

returns._0: the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace
array contains all market items that listed for sale
array contains all the pending market items
array contains all the pending market items
array contains all sold market items
array contains all the created items by msg.sender
the price of listing an nft for sale
the address of the marketplace owner
array contains all the market items which has been bought by caller

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

grantValidator(address).details: this function is called by the admin only although it prevents the admin from granting the role himself as he is already a validator

params.newValidator: the address of the person the admin want to make him a validator

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

rejectItem(uint256).details: it changes the state of the item from pending to remove and send the nft back to it's owner notify the validator

params._itemId: the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

revokeValidator(address).details: this function is called by the admin only also it prevents the admin from revoking the role himself

params.ToBeRevokedValidator: the address of the person the admin want to remove him from validation

withdrawItem(uint256).details: it checks if the caller is the owner of item or not

params._itemId: the ID of the item that contain nft and it's info in the marketplace

logListedForSale(uint256,uint256,address.notice: the item is listed for sale

logPending(uint256,uint256,uint8,address.notice: the item is pending and need to be validated first to be listed

logPriceChanged(uint256,uint256).notice: change the price of an nft in

logRemoved(uint256).notice: the nft has been removed from the marketplace

BuyItem(uint256).notice: buying a token which listed for sale at fixed price,

acceptItem(uint256).notice: accept nft to be listed for sale

changeItemPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: change the price of an owned nft

changeListingPrice(uint256).notice: change the price of listing of nft

createListingRequest(address,uint256,uin.notice: create a request for listing a token in the marketplace

getListingPrice().notice: return the listing price of the marketplace

getMarketplaceOwner().notice: return the owner of the marketplace

getNumberOfAllNFTS().notice: return the number of all nfts in the marketplace

getNumberOfPendingNFTS().notice: return the number of pending nfts in the marketplace

getNumberOfSoldNFTS().notice: return the number of Sold nfts in the marketplace

grantValidator(address).notice: make a new validator to a the valid

rejectItem(uint256).notice: reject nft so that it isn't listed for sale

revokeValidator(address).notice: remove dishonest validator from the validation proccess

withdrawItem(uint256).notice: withdraw an item from the marketplace,
